localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.title:
On the one hand, stocks are looking pricey here.

And on the other hand, there can only be  a maximum amount of companies in the S&P 500 at any given time.  

Supply is finite. Demand is infinite.
nodes.author: Michael Batnick

localize.full_text:
一方面，这里的股票看起来很贵。

而另一方面，在任何时候，S&P 500的公司只能有一个最大的数量。 

供应是有限的。需求是无限的。

一方面，這裏的股票看起來很貴。

而另一方面，在任何時候，S&P 500的公司只能有一個最大的數量。 

供應是有限的。需求是無限的。

nodes.title:
Bitcoin hits $57,000 for the first time, nearly doubling since the start of the year.

A week ago it was at $47,000.
A month ago it was at $34,000.
A year ago it was at $9,000.

$BTC https://t.co/EScLC3yv1l
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

一周前，它的价格是47000美元。
一个月前，它是在34000美元。
一年前，它是在9000美元。

$BTC https://t.co/EScLC3yv1l

Rates: coming off record lows

The roaring 20s is basically already here once we can add vacations to this list

住房：创历史新高

加密：创历史新高

nodes.title:
At $7.56 trillion, the Fed's Balance Sheet hit another new high this week.

The Fed's total assets have increased $3.4 trillion over the last year and they have promised to keep buying bonds at a rate of $120 billion per month. https://t.co/BZnuED1CHd
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text:
7.56万亿美元，本周美联储资产负债表再创新高。

美联储的总资产在过去一年中增加了3.4万亿美元，他们承诺将继续以每月1200亿美元的速度购买债券。https://t.co/BZnuED1CHd。

7.56萬億美元，本週美聯儲資產負債表再創新高。

美聯儲的總資產在過去一年中增加了3.4萬億美元，他們承諾將繼續以每月1200億美元的速度購買債券。https://t.co/BZnuED1CHd。

nodes.title: Buy and hold is one of the dumbest investment strategies ever that also happens to have the highest probability of success for the vast majority of investors
nodes.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text: 买入并持有是史上最愚蠢的投资策略之一，也恰恰是绝大多数投资者成功概率最高的策略。
買入並持有是史上最愚蠢的投資策略之一，也恰恰是絕大多數投資者成功概率最高的策略。
